description: Engineered for the perfect fit, enjoy multi-season performance with KÜHL’s all-new REBEL™ Men's Jacket. Fully insulated and fitted with soft flannel lining, you'll experience lightweight warmth and ultimate comfort when the chill sets in. The tough, abrasion-resistant exterior looks cotton-like but repels water like a synthetic. ? Three zippered pockets provide secure storage.
name: Kuhl Rebel Insulated Jacket - Mens
